text: All I wanted to do was write - at the time, poems, and prose, too. I guess my ambition was simply to make money however I could to keep myself going in some modest way, and I didn't need much, I was unmarried at the time, no children.
author: Paul Auster

text: We at Chrysler borrow money the old-fashioned way. We pay it back.
author: Lee Iacocca

text: No man's credit is as good as his money.
author: John Dewey

text: Victory is everything. You can spend the money but you can never spend the memories.
author: Ken Venturi

text: Of course, I do everything for money.
author: Christopher Hitchens
